detectors.description:
Acid.init(uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#61-68) should emit an event for:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Acid.burn() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#70-80):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(DGDInterface(dgdTokenContract).transferFrom(msg.sender,0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,_amount),No DGDs or DGD account not authorized) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#75)
	- (_success,None) = _user.call.value(_wei)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#77)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (_success,None) = _user.call.value(_wei)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#77)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Refund(_user,_amount,_wei) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#79)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Acid.burn()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#L70-L80):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool,string)(DGDInterface(dgdTokenContract).transferFrom(msg.sender,0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,_amount),No DGDs or DGD account not authorized)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#L75)
	- [(_success,None) = _user.call.value(_wei)()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#L77)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [(_success,None) = _user.call.value(_wei)()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#L77)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Refund(_user,_amount,_wei)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Acid.sol#L79)
